name: 5th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Neurological Disorders
content: Following the remarkable accomplishments of the previous four gatherings in 2017, 2018, 2019, and 2020, we are thrilled to announce that we will be holding the “5th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Neurological Disorders” (Neurology 2022) in Rome Italy during June 15-16, 2022\. The Neurology conference will be centered upon the theme “Sensing New Horizons and Bridging Synaptic Gaps in Neurology.” The Worldwide Congress on Neurology and Neurological Disorders will present an overview of recent accomplishments and innovations by famous researchers and experts in Neurology field, as well as the opportunity to explore potential and emerging research fields in this Neurology discipline. We are dedicated to bringing leading researchers, scientists, academicians, neurologists, neuro professionals, industry giants and healthcare professionals in order to gain a deeper understanding of the topic and to investigate many facets of this discipline. The goal of the summit is to create translational neuroscience initiatives that will assist people better understand how treatment procedures have advanced and how the field has matured in recent years.
